code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:white m aged 67 yrs complains of recurrent Body Aches over the past month. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol he does not smoke o:Height 69 in, Weight 146 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 91, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, B burgdorferi IgG Serum positive a:Lyme Disease p:administered amoxicillin/calvulanate - 875 mg 2x day, performed B burgdorferi IgG Serum, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

s:a white M aged 68 years presents with 6 weeks history of worsening mild gradual onset of blurred vision. he denies ever using cigarettes he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 68 in, Weight 143 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered non-dilated fundus examination.

content2.Unmatched: he denies ever using cigarettes he denies drinking alcohol

td.content: s:white m aged 68 yrs presents with Body Aches. he denies drinking alcohol he denies smoking o:Height 69 in, Weight 146 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 70, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.
